body: Tshering Tobgay, the leader of the Opposition Party in the National Assembly of Bhutan, has a new year's wish: "that the first person to be caught and jailed under the Tobacco Control Act is a member of parliament."
original_body: Tshering Tobgay, the leader of the Opposition Party in the National Assembly of Bhutan, has a new year's wish: "that the first person to be caught and jailed under the Tobacco Control Act is a member of parliament."
title: Bhutan: Tobacco Ban And A New Years Wish

sentence: Tshering Tobgay, the leader of the Opposition Party in the National Assembly of Bhutan, has a new year's wish: "that the first person to be caught and jailed under the Tobacco Control Act is a member of parliament."
